name: connect2mongodb
description: Dynamically Connect to MongoDB databse & close connection.

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm rum lint && npm run build
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm rum lint && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.publishBeta: npm run clean && npm rum lint && npm run build && npm publish --beta
scripts.test: rimraf node_modules/ && npm i && npm link connect2mongodb && cd ./test && node index.js

author: Priyal "Capta1n" Raj
